dict.string: On iOS, iPadOS, and macOS 26, the app shines with a fresh, revised design â€“ including Liquid-Glass effects and Dark Mode support for in-app icons.
You can now select and edit multiple transactions at once. This allows you to assign the same category or specific tags to all of them, for example.
In the advanced settings, you can now set a fixed time zone. This ensures your data is displayed consistently everywhere, regardless of where you are.
